text:
I'd like to be able to store information about a Test plan in the JMeter test
plan  file itself. A good way to do this would be to use the Comments field (on
the Test Plan node), however it is only a single-line field so not very much
information can be displayed at one time.

If the Comments field was changed to a multi-line textbox with say, 7-10 lines
visible on the screen, if would be able to display much more information.

The kind of information that I'd like to be able to associate to a Test Plan is:
+ high-level description of the test plan functionality
+ specific data required for the test (eg, web login account privileges etc)
+ Expected User Defined Variable values (ie, brief description of what the
variables should be)
